documentation.text:
@dev Emitted when an 'owner' gives an 'inscriber' one time approval to add or remove an inscription for
 the 'tokenId' at 'nftAddress'.
@dev Gives `inscriber` a one time approval to add or remove an inscription for `tokenId` at `nftAddress`

@dev Similar to the ERC721 implementation, Approve or remove `operator` as an operator for the caller.
 Operators can call {addInscriptionWithSig} or {addInscription} for any nft owned by the caller.
 Requirements:
 - The `operator` cannot be the caller.
 Emits an {ApprovalForAll} event.
@dev Returns if the `operator` is allowed to inscribe or remove inscriptions for all nfts owned by `owner`

attributes.text:
@dev Emitted when an 'owner' gives an 'inscriber' one time approval to add or remove an inscription for
 the 'tokenId' at 'nftAddress'.
@dev Gives `inscriber` a one time approval to add or remove an inscription for `tokenId` at `nftAddress`

@dev Similar to the ERC721 implementation, Approve or remove `operator` as an operator for the caller.
 Operators can call {addInscriptionWithSig} or {addInscription} for any nft owned by the caller.
 Requirements:
 - The `operator` cannot be the caller.
 Emits an {ApprovalForAll} event.
@dev Returns if the `operator` is allowed to inscribe or remove inscriptions for all nfts owned by `owner`

Approval(address,address,address,uint256.details: Emitted when an 'owner' gives an 'inscriber' one time approval to add or remove an inscription for the 'tokenId' at 'nftAddress'.

addInscription((address,uint256),(addres.details: Adds an inscription on-chain to the specified nft

params.data: The tokenId of the NFT that is being signed
params.sig: An optional URI, to not set this, pass the empty string ""  Requirements: - `tokenId` The user calling this method must own the `tokenId` at `nftAddress` or has been approved - `URIId` URIId must exist

approve(address,address,uint256).details: Gives `inscriber` a one time approval to add or remove an inscription for `tokenId` at `nftAddress`

getInscriptionData(uint256).details: Fetches the inscription location at inscriptionID  Requirements: - `inscriptionID` inscriptionID must exist

getInscriptionURI(uint256).details: Fetches the inscriptionURI at inscriptionID  Requirements: - `inscriptionID` inscriptionID must exist

getNFTLocation(uint256).details: Fetches the inscription location at inscriptionID  Requirements: - `inscriptionID` inscriptionID must exist

isApprovedForAll(address,address).details: Returns if the `operator` is allowed to inscribe or remove inscriptions for all nfts owned by `owner`

params.inscriptionId: The ID of the inscription that will be removed  Requirements:  - `inscriptionId` The user calling this method must own the `tokenId` at `nftAddress` of the inscription at `inscriptionId` or has been approved

setApprovalForAll(address,bool).details: Similar to the ERC721 implementation, Approve or remove `operator` as an operator for the caller. Operators can call {addInscriptionWithSig} or {addInscription} for any nft owned by the caller. Requirements: - The `operator` cannot be the caller. Emits an {ApprovalForAll} event.
